**ProvisionHost.com**

It has been quite some time since I posted our last offer. Over the past few weeks we've been doing a tremendous amount of restructuring at Provision Host. This includes resolving specific network issues in our Toronto location and thinking through different products and services you guys may be interested in. Since Provision Host was established in 2010, we've always focussed on offering great value to clients. In doing so, we've made it a commitment as a company, to continue striving for this. And quite frankly, other competing companies charge a medium - high end amount for the exact or similar services we offer. This is where we truly stand out and what has continued to drive forward our success.

Today I present to you, two new plans (1 for each location)! This is exclusively for the LET community. The specifications are below...

**PHVPS.25 Plan**
Dedicated RAM 128MB
Burstable to 256MB
5GB Disk Space
500GB Bandwidth
SolusVM Control Panel
Tun / Tap Enabled Upon Request
OpenVZ

**Annual Cost: $13.33 USD**

Toronto Location Order: [Order Now](https://client.provisionhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=107)
Dallas Location Order: [Order Now](https://client.provisionhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=107)
